EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Honeywell AERO Tech Forum.Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for being a part of the first-ever Honeywell Tech Forum!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THANK YOU! We are so glad you were able to join us for the Honeywell Tech Forum 2020. It was an incredible few weeks of content; we hope you enjoyed it and learned something new that will help you and your business, today and tomorrow.
The great news is, it doesnâ€™t end here! You can still explore the forum <[[https://vshow.on24.com/vshow/HW2020/lobby/18102]]> and watch all content on-demand.
And be sure to stay connected to our Honeywell team on how we can help make the future, together! STAY CONNECTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>
